import React, { Component } from 'react' import {callApi, s, e, swr, apiConfigs, url} from '../../adapter/common' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import InputField from '../../components/inputField' import ButtonS from '../../components/buttons.js' import check from "../../assets/images/check.svg"; import styles from "../../styles/onboard/sign_up.module.scss"; class SignUp extends Component{ constructor (props){ super(props) this.state = { fullname: '', email: '', school: '', category: '', password: '', isLoading: false } } modelSelect(e){ this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } model(e){ this.setState({ [e.name]: e.text }) } async signup(){ if(this.state.isLoading === true){ return } if(this.state.fullname.trim()==='' || this.state.email.trim()==='' || this.state.category.trim()==='' || this.state.password.trim()==='' || this.state.school===''){ return e("Please, ensure you have filled in all the fields") } else{ this.setState({ isLoading : true }) const res = await callApi('post', apiConfigs.apiUrl+'user/register.php', this.state) if(res.status === 200){ s(res.data.message + " Proceed to Login") this.props.history.push('/') } else{ swr(res.data.message) } this.setState({ isLoading : false }) } } render(){ return(
